name: politico
text: A group of unions called on major brands to stop sourcing goods from Xinjiang, where China continues a crackdown on the Uighur community. The chair of the European Parliament's delegation for relations with China is now asking Volkswagen to do the same. https://t.co/lyIevRFArU

name: politico
text:
In late April, a coronavirus research team from the CDC fanned out across two predominantly Black counties in Georgia, going door to door in face shields asking for samples of blood with little prior warning.

The plan backfired. https://t.co/0hmc9AYXdP

name: politico
text: Even before Senate Republicans roll out a proposal on the next coronavirus relief package, top Trump administration officials are already pushing a backup plan in case negotiations stall.https://t.co/TGzEAMwVQv

text: Trump's coronavirus testing czar said Sunday that anyone who “needs” a coronavirus test can get one — but he also acknowledged that the average turnaround time for tests is too long, as cases continue to spike https://t.co/s1NI2pDSDO

text: As Joe Biden conducts a series of interviews with a final list of potential running mates ahead of his August decision, his biggest concern is that there is nobody on his list with whom he has any previous deep relationship https://t.co/VFHv8fyNwj

text: More than 360 delegates, most of whom back Bernie Sanders, have signed on to a pledge to vote against the Democratic Party’s platform if it does not include support for "Medicare for All" https://t.co/plTis8uu9O

text:

text: BREAKING: National security adviser Robert O'Brien tests positive for Covid-19 https://t.co/5Sg6v5IfSp https://t.co/yEwOOMoo4s

name: politico
text: Congress is on track to let the beefed up unemployment benefits expire at the end of this week — and the preemptive finger-pointing on Capitol Hill has already begun https://t.co/vOSyEU7IUb

name: politico
text: It’s unclear how O’Brien was exposed to the coronavirus or how much in-person contact he’s had recently with Trump. Anyone who is near the president is tested regularly for the disease. https://t.co/vbj5IoCb45

name: politico
text: O’Brien’ is the highest-ranking official to test positive for the coronavirus. Previous White House aides to be infected include Katie Miller, Vice President Mike Pence’s top communications aide, and also a personal valet for the president. https://t.co/vbj5IoCb45

name: politico
text: We’ve got just 99 days to go until Election Day — which will both go by in a blink of an eye and seem like the longest 99 days in American history https://t.co/OLH979hgvN
